KnowledgeBase.Title: isType
KnowledgeBase.ArgumentTypes: Character String Symbol Vector BitVector ByteVector IntVector ShortVector FltVector ObjVector Structure Dictionary Directory Brick Date Function Matrix NumMatrix Integer Float Number Complex Boolean Pair List Void ObjecRepository
KnowledgeBase.DataType: String Symbol Structure ShortVector Dictionary Directory Vector Function Complex Boolean Brick Matrix Pair Void Character Number Date NumMatrix FltVector IntVector NumVector ObjVector BitVector ObjectRepository
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: isObject isString isText isSymbol isBitVector isPcodeVector isVector isByteVector isNumberVector isFloatVector isIntegerVector isNumberMatrix isStructure isDictionary isDirectory isObjectVector isPair isTransaction isImmediate isNumber isInteger isMoney isCharacter isBoolean isDate

Function.Description: The isType function returns true if the argument is of the specified type. Otherwise, it returns false.

Brief.Overview: The isType function is a predicate which returns true if the argument {obj} is a of type {name}; otherwise, the predicate returns false.
Brief.Usage: The isType function is used to query an object if it is of any native type. The isType is equivalent to: ( = typeName: (type obj) )
Brief.Usage-Void: The isType function can be used to query an object if it is of type void. Any uninitialized variable will always be type void .
Brief.Usage-Boolean: The isType function can be used to query an object if it is of type Boolean.
Brief.Usage-Character: The isType function can be used to query an object if it is of type Character.
Brief.Usage-Number: The isType function can be used to query an object if it is of type Number, Integer, or Money.
Brief.Usage-Date: The isType can be used to query an object if it has type Date.
Brief.Usage-Function: The isType can be used to query an object if it has type Function.
Brief.Usage-Complex: The isType can be used to query an object if it has type Complex.
Brief.Usage-ObjectRepository: The isType can be used to query an object if it has type ObjectRepository.

Argument.Name: typeName
Argument.Note: Any Analytic Information Server object type.

Argument.Name: obj
Argument.AISTypes: Character, String, Symbol, Vector, BitVector, ByteVector, IntVector, Boolean FltVector, ObjVector, Structure, Dictionary, Directory, Pair, Function, List, ShortVector, Matrix, NumMatrix, Integer, Float, Number, Complex, Brick, Void, Date, ObjecRepository

Syntax.Return: If the argument is of the specified type, true is returned. Otherwise,it false is returned.
